content: This touches a bunch of files, but it is pretty simple. It just uses the new hom classes to generalize some lemmas and obliterate the old redundant ones. Anyone want to have a look?
My only minor concern is whether we want to leave these lemmas in the monoid_hom namespace as you currently have, or come up with a name in the root namespace

There are only a few I left in the monoid_hom namespace: eq_on_inv, map_exists_{left, right}_inv. I left them because they seemed rather specialized, and I didn't want to clutter the root namespace. They're not protected though, so people could open monoid_hom to get them.
